q: Gerald Ford , who produces the show with his wife Michelle, said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert Gerald Ford said. Take a peek at our photographers' favorites from the past year. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. Bob Marley knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. Bob Marley wanted to get the monkey off my back. Bob Marley 'm just excited that Bob Marley got my first win and Bob Marley can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . 's executive chairman. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Stephen Elop the optimist In a press conference, Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer touted the alliance as good for both companies' aspirations. A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity, but an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty, Stephen Elop said, quoting England's historic prime minister Winston Churchill as he spoke in London. While The X Factor will be open to singers like Susan Boyle , Simon Cowell is also excited to have kids as young as 12 years old audition- an opinion he didn't always have. American Idol?

Simpson slams weight obsession The star dismissed speculation that she might join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of the upcoming Fox series. Simpson wrote on her Twitter page: Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) . A string of high profile names have been linked to the show including Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole .
